Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ibger 0.1.0

  • Initial CRAN release.
  • Core functions: ibge_aggregates(), ibge_metadata(), ibge_periods(), ibge_localities(), ibge_variables().
  • Pre-flight validation against aggregate metadata for all query parameters.
  • In-memory metadata cache with ibge_clear_cache().
  • parse_ibge_value() utility for converting IBGE special value codes.
  • parse_sidra_url() and fetch_sidra_url() for migrating from SIDRA API URLs (e.g. from the Query Builder or sidrar package).
  • Support for flat view (view = "flat") response parsing.
  • Four vignettes: getting started, API concepts, IPCA example, and a real-world tutorial on tracking state GDP components.

Developed by Andre Leite, Marcos Wasilew, Hugo Vasconcelos, Carlos Amorin, Diogo Bezerra.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
